about: Established in August 2001, Marian Engineering College in Trivandrum has achieved the distinguished 11th position among ÂµLearn campus chapters in Kerala. With dedication and innovation at our core, we spark and cultivate the talents and abilities of our students through immersive bootcamps in web development, UI/UX design, AI/ML, and cybersecurity. Our aim is to empower students to become adept problem solvers and visionary leaders in the ever-evolving landscape of technology. Our approach is not just about offering knowledge; it's about instilling a passion for innovation and a drive for continuous learning. We are embarking on a journey of innovation and excellence at Marian Engineering College.
